DataElement.preferredName: Patient Hospitalization Post Bone Marrow Transplantation Discharge Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The begin date of the patients hospitalization after bone marrow transplant charge.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Hospitalization Post Bone Marrow Transplantation Discharge Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The description of an event that occurred in an individual during the hospitalization period._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._A procedure to replace diseased or pathologic bone marrow with transplanted healthy bone marrow cells._The release of a patient from a course of care._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Hospitalization Event Post Bone Marrow Transplantation Patient Discharge Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: The description of an event that occurred in an individual during the hospitalization period.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:A procedure to replace diseased or pathologic bone marrow with transplanted healthy bone marrow cells.:The release of a patient from a course of care.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: The description of an event that occurred in an individual during the hospitalization period.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
A procedure to replace diseased bone marrow with transplanted healthy bone marrow cells.
The release of a patient from a course of care.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
